If the 'To' field is empty then no e-mails will be sent. You may use the following keywords in any of the above fields:
  • %form_info% - a list of form information including the asset id, name and URL of the form, and the name and asset id of the site
  • %form_summary% - a list of responses received from this submission
The address entered in this field will be used to send receipt e-mails. You may select from fields of E-mail Address type only. If this field is empty no receipt e-mails will be sent.

Note that the receipt will always be sent to the address entered in the e-mail field specified above. You can use the 'To' address to specify additional email addresses that the receipt should also be sent to. You may use the following keywords in any of the above fields:
  • %form_info% - a list of form information including the asset id, name and URL of the form, and the name and asset id of the site
  • %form_summary% - a list of responses received from this submission
